post.body: I just finished two drawings for my boyfriends band and now I'm sleeping. Which I need to do cuz At first I wrote "I just finished sleaping"

RT @xhaleyx: Is laying in bed dying! :C
Don't die;; I love you<3
I'm doing math homework and freaking out about english
Just finished the first two pirates of the Caribbean movies and now sleeping
STILL trying to understand the meaning of this site.
Still trying to figure out the point of this, textig my kirby, and getting back on the computer.
Drawing, texting Chris and Emily, and lurking the interweb, obviously.
